profile.name: Yahya
profile.title: Computer Science Engineer | Cybersecurity & Full-Stack Developer
profile.intro: Driven developer with a passion for building secure, scalable, and impactful digital solutions.
profile.bio: I am a B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering student specializing in Cyber Security with hands-on experience in secure web development, IoT automation, and modern software engineering. I enjoy solving real-world problems through technology, with strong interests in ethical hacking, cyber hygiene analysis, and AI-driven systems.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
education.details: Relevant coursework: Cyber Security Essentials, Network Security, Web Development, Database Management, IoT Systems.

certifications.title: Introduction to Cyber Security
certifications.description: Covered cyber threats, secure practices, network protection, and digital safety.

certifications.title: Python Essentials
certifications.description: Completed core Python programming and scripting fundamentals.

certifications.title: Networking Fundamentals
certifications.description: Learned networking architecture, protocols, routing, and security basics.

certifications.title: Operating System Fundamentals
certifications.description: Covered OS concepts, processes, scheduling, memory, and file management.

certifications.title: Software Engineering
certifications.description: Explored SDLC models, design principles, and software development best practices.

projects.description: Conducted full cyber hygiene assessments for small business websites, identifying weak security practices and implementing improvements like SSL enforcement, secure authentication, and basic protection mechanisms.

projects.title: Food Analysis & Freshness Detection System (IoT + AI)
projects.description: Developed an IoT system integrated with AI to analyze food freshness using temperature, humidity, gas sensors, and image recognition with spoilage alerts.
